reviews.review: Juego muy entretenido.
Fun game
Man, I loved this game, really cool, and I started to like GlAdOs!
good way to kill time with ur friends .....
I honestly think this may be the best game ever. Well written, surprising, and puzzling. Super quotable!
Super fun game. I recommend this to anyone that has more than a 5 minute attention span.
This game is ma'fuckin ballin'

this game is just WOW I never played portal 1, so when started to play this game i was a bit skeptical about it. but i started to get into the true gameplay and fell in love with it. I think i raged quit about 50 times lol. but I think in the games on steam this is easily in the top 10. IF you got the money this game is a great time killer.
One of the best puzzle games ever created.

Portal 2 is an amazing game.
Great graphics, good story, characters with distinct and fleshed out personality, overall a great experience. 

I enjoyed it even though I hadn't played the first one when I completed this. The puzzles weren't too challenging and were just right for nearly all of the audience this game targets, although I found the co-op puzzles a bit more tricky as more elements need to be in the correct place at the correct time to actually get through stuff.

This game is great and I would reccommend it to any of my family/friends as long as they can handle puzzles and using a controller or mouse in a 3D game.
I'd describe this game as a sequel worthy of the first part's legacy. While keeping the humour and sarcasm, the game also extends the plot to an appropriate extent.

Glados is back.
Portal 2 is simply the best action puzzle Game ever made.
Portal 2 have a good Story with funny Jokes, a perfect atmosphere and a nice little twist so you wont be disapointed.
In the co-op the game will be a bit harder, because you cant solve the puzzles by your own anymore.
So get a friend and show Glados that you are smart enough to survive her challanges.

The sequel to The Cake is a Meme. Has multiplayer and user created content.

How do you not already own this? They've given this away for free...
i like this game

Uma das séries que mais inovaram no mundo dos games. Mais elaborado que seu antecessor, o jogo tem um enredo incrível aliado a jogabilidade inovadora.

Trata-se de um jogo puzzle, onde o player tem que criar portais para ir de um lugar para o outro.

Vale ressaltar ainda o multplayer, seguindo a mesma linha do jogo single player, dois jogadores têm que trabalhar em conjunto para resolver diversos desafios.
soo good :)  and soo funny :)
Awesome game. Many unique puzzles.

what a game this is!
the best puzzle game ive ever played

PORTAL 2 , quem diria q esse jogo consegue entreter o jogador?

pois é , quando vi esse jogo achei q era chato , mas lembrei que todo jogo da valve é incrivel e resolvi comprar PORTAL 2.

apenas no comeco do jogo ja fiquei curioso pela historia do game , joguei PORTAL 2 sem parar e quando zerei o jogo , hehehh...... parabens valve ... conseguiu me entreter :-)

PORTAL 2 apresenta uma historia incrivel , graficos muito bom , trilha sonora do jogo PERFEITA e principalmente com POUCOS BUGS.

nota: 10/10
I absolutely love this game. The ability to create test chambers and down/upload to Steam is awesome.

Absolutely amazing game! Get a friend and have a blast on one of the best co-op games ever.

Una pequeña joya que supera a su precuela. Disfrutable tanto en solitario como en cooperativo.
Su principal baza es el "pique" para resolver las diferentes fases, aunque tampoco es que sean muy complicadas.

Para tener un par de años, luce bastante bien.
El apartado sonoro es brillante, tanto por los efectos como por la BSO. La canción del final mola. :P
Es algo corto. En 5 horas se termina el modo solitario.

Compra totalmente recomendada.
这款游戏不用多说了，非常棒的谜题设计，独特的玩法，就这样
Игра в которую действительно интересно играть и трудно оторваться

Comme le premier, il est excellent. Les passages old school sont vraiments bien vu.

Awesome, funny, and interesting. SImples.

Recomendo esse jogo por ser algo inovador, é o primeiro que eu jogo na série, mas mesmo assim, sempre me surpreendo, sempre há algo novo, principalmente pra quem gosta de brain teasers e puzzles, além da liberdade para jogar com os amigos, tanto a campanha, como custom maps
Una trama davvero bella e giocare in coop con gli amici è davvero divertente.

I found Portal 2 the best game I have ever played.Simply the best Valve game ever.You made a great work, Valve, and thank You for this great story, beautiful dialogues with funny jokes, interesting puzzles, perfect atmosphere and a lot of fun in co-op with friends.
Showw
:D

Portal 2 é a continuação do famoso e divertido game de puzzles Portal.
E a Valve realmente se superou nesse jogo, criando um game absolutamente genial.
Os enigmas são inteligentes e interessante, a história é leve, criativa e extremamente engraçada.
Se ainda não jogou, está perdendo.
SUPER RECOMENDADO!
Portal 2 é uma experiência única.
Great sequel to a great part 1

This game is the best possible evolution of Portal ideas - many great puzzle mechanics, a new full twisted plot and hours of fun listening to old [strike]good[/strike] evil GlaDOS and your new [strike]friend[/strike] foe - Wheatley.

Strongly recommended for all gamers as well as the first game.
Everything about this game is beautiful the 1st time through. its one of those games that i feel everyone needs to play at least once. just because the story is so beautiful.
Good. Yes.
Cool
Jóféle

This game is freakin' brilliant. And I mean: 'BRILLIANT' in every sense of the word.

I loved every second of the single player part. Lot's of humour, an interesting story and some of the puzzles are of sheer genious design. I really wanted to get help at times, but I didn't. They can be hard but not unsolvable if you put your mind to it. 

The co-op part of the game is even better. Also with great humour and really perplexing puzzles that makes you glad you have a friend along for the ride. 

I'd definatly recommend this game.
当之无愧的神作,而且联机合作部分的乐趣更多
Historia muyyy buena!
Отличная игра для Ваших детей. Имхо тренирует трёхмерное восприятие, абстрактное планирование, внимательность.
gr8!
Awesome. Even better than the first one!

As expected very fun. Great puzzle game and I can't wait to complete the multiplayer campaign.

One of the few games that can legitimately be called Epic. Great challenges, great graphics, awesome COOP, engrossing storyline. Buy it. Buy it now. Even at regular price. Also, have a friend buy it, or buy it for them (then play the COOP with them); you won't regret it.
